document.full_text: a northwestern university journalism professor whose investigations of wrongful convictions were cited when illinois recently banned the death penalty has been sidelined amid allegations that some of his students may have violated the law.
document.title: chicago professor who probed death penalty is sidelined
lines_and_colors: a northwestern university journalism professor whose investigations of wrongful convictions were cited when illinois recently banned the death penalty has been sidelined amid allegations that some of his students may have violated the law.
